item.title: Donations
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

Donations are accepted via :

  • PayPal
  • Amazon US gift card
  • Steam gift card (Any currency)
  • Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin or Dash)

If you wish to donate via PayPal please contact Charlie in the discord server.

Blockquote

If you wish to donate via an Amazon US gift card, Steam gift card or Cryptocurrency please contact Customality on the discord server.

Under $15

  • Although donations under $15 are accepted, you will not receive any benefits.

$15+

  • A ‘donator’ role on the forums and in the discord server.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.

$35+

  • An ‘Elite Donator’ role on the forums and in the discord server.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • An emote of your choice added to the discord server.

$75+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 3 emotes of your choice added to the discord server.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.

$150+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 5 emotes of your choice added to the discord server along with 1 gif emote.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.

$200+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 5 emotes of your choice added to the discord server along with 3 gif emotes.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.
  • Access to the use of external emotes

$300+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 5 emotes of your choice added to the discord server along with 5 gif emotes.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.
  • Access to the use of external emotes

$400+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 5 emotes of your choice added to the discord server along with 10 gif emotes.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.
  • Access to the use of external emotes

$500+

  • A role on the forums and in the discord server with a name and colour of your choice.
  • The ability to attach files in the discord server.
  • The ability to embed links in the discord server.
  • Access to beta versions of Hexus when they are released.
  • Permission to change your nickname in the discord server.
  • 5 emotes of your choice added to the discord server along with 10 gif emotes.
  • A private voice channel that you have control over.
  • Priority speaker in General Voice 3 in the discord server.
  • Access to the use of external emotes

item.title: Hexus ToS
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

Hexus Terms of Service

  1. There are no refunds, nor may you chargeback.
  2. Hexus is for you and you alone, you may not share, sell, etc.
  3. Hexus may not be used in the instance of scamming, etc.
  4. Cracking, decompiling and reverse engineering of Hexus is forbidden.
  5. Developers of this product are not obligated to update, however it is unlikely.
  6. We can blacklist any user at any time for whatever reason we deem fit.
    [TOS are subject to change at any time!]

Posts: 2

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: Errors & Fixes
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

If you are experiencing any issues with Hexus, please first check the current status of Hexus, make sure its updated, then continue to attempt the following fixes.

Basic First Steps

  • Delete Hexus, and re-download it here
  • Extract Hexus from the zip file into a folder
  • Open Windows Defender Security Center.
  • Select Virus & threat protection > Virus & threat protection settings > Add or remove exclusions.
  • Select add exclusions and select the folder you extracted Hexus to
  • If you have installed ‘time machine’, uninstall and re-install ROBLOX.

Injection/Crashing Issues

  • Check you actually have the Hexus.dll, located in the binaries folder.
  • Download and install this then restart your device.

Windows 7 Crashes

  • Do not use the ‘Remember Login’ option, as this causes an error which results in Hexus Crashing.
  • If you are experiencing crashes, please run this.

Invalid Login

  • Check the time on your device matches the current time in your timezone
  • Check you are using the correct username and password (Your login details for Hexus are the details you use to login here, on the forum)
  • Check you have purchased Hexus and you have your ‘Buyer’ role and you aren’t ‘Blacklisted’, you can check your roles here

If you are still experiencing any issues regarding Hexus, contact myself or another member of staff.

Posts: 2

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: Hexus Functions
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

Available c functions
-void printconsole(string content)
-table getgenv()
-table getrawmetatable((table | userdata) object)
-void setrawmetatable((table | userdata) object, table mt)
-table getreg()
-table getrenv()
-void setreadonly(table t)
-void mouse1press()
-void mouse1release()
-void mouse2press()
-void mouse2release()
-void keypress(int charCode)
-void keyrelease(int charCode)
-void mousemoverel(int x, int y)
-void setclipboard(string content)
-(function | (nil, string)) loadstring(string source, string chunkName)
-bool checkcaller()
-function newcclosure(function f)
-(table | nil) debug.getmetatable(Variant obj)
-void debug.setmetatable(table t)
-table debug.getupvalues((int | function) f)
-((string, Variant) | Variant) debug.getupvalue((int | function) f, (int | string) upvalIndex)
-((string, Variant) | Variant) debug.setupvalue((int | function) f, (int | string) upvalIndex, Variant value)

Other features:
-Http Functions
-GetObjects

Planned features:
-decompiler

Want to purchase Hexus? You can do so here.

Participants: 1

item.title: Purchase Hexus
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

DO NOT BUY HEXUS FROM PEOPLE WHO ARE BELOW OWNER

With the purchase of Hexus, you state you have read and you agree to the Terms of Service

[Hexus is $20 USD] [When Purchasing, if you pay $50, you’ll also receive Elite Donator, worth $35]

To purchase Hexus you require an account here on the forums. Please make sure you read the rules (The channel you’re put in when you join) before you go to general, so you don’t get punished

[PayPal]
To purchase with PayPal directly, DM Charlie on the discord when he is online. If you DM him when he is offline, he will not see your message, as his direct messages are cleared when he gets online, please be patient when awaiting a reply from Charlie, he gets hundreds of DMs per day. Do not send a payment to a PayPal account without charlie telling you to.
OR
Purchase an amazon gift card here and use it to purchase via the below method.

[Amazon - US]
Send Electron#7189 a direct message on discord, you must be in the Hexus discord server to do this, Electron is a bot and cannot accept Friend requests.
;buy FORUM_USERNAME amazon GIFT_CARD_CODE

[Steam - Any currency equivalent to $20 USD or more]
Send Electron#7189 a direct message on discord, you must be in the Hexus discord server to do this, Electron is a bot and cannot accept Friend requests.
;buy FORUM_USERNAME steam GIFT_CARD_CODE

[CryptoCurrency] Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash or Bitcoin Cash
Purchase Hexus with CryptoCurrency here and DM Customality on the discord server. with the code you receive along with your username, here on the forums.

[Please allow up to 24 hours to be whitelisted after you purchase]

Once you have been whitelisted, you will be able to access the download thread in the buyer announcements category, which contains the most recent version of Hexus.

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: Migrate from https://beta.gethexus.net (Old website for old buyers)
item.dc:creator: @ZomeDash
item.description:
@ZomeDash wrote:

  1. Open two tabs
  2. Log in to beta.gethexus.net on the first tab, it’ll redirect you to the Forums. Keep the tab open.
  3. Go to https://beta.gethexus.net/syncDiscourse on the second tab
  4. Input Forum username
